resources.string: Your device don`t support nfc communication
You need to turn the nfc on your phone
Are you sure you wanna delete this value?
Bring the NFC card closer to your phone.
Bring your phone closer to the NFC reader.
The reading view is used to check what information the card stores and displays information about the card. To use this you need to:
Place the NFC card on your phone.

The saving view is used to overwrite the contents of the NFC card. Overwriting only works on cards that have this option. To check if you can write values to the card, check it in the reading window and then find the `Is writable` field. It is possible to add several values to the record, but it depends on the capacity of the NFC card, you can check it in the card reading in the `Max size of Storage` field. To use this function you must:
Select what data you want to save.
Enter the data in the appropriate text fields.
Press the `Save on NFC card` button.
Touch the card until the visible field disappears.

The emulate view is used to use the phone as an NFC card, thanks to which the user is able to transfer his message as if he were using a physical card. The maximum number of tags that a user can upload at one time is one. To use this function you must:
Select what data you want to save.
Enter the data in the appropriate text fields.
Select which value the user wants to emulate.
Touch your mobile device to the NFC device or card reader.
